http.title: web design aylesbury | shared creative
http.html:
See us on...
call us: 01296 346 346
email: hello@sharedcreative.co.uk
  • Home
  • About Us
  • Our Work
  • Websites
  • Branding
  • Design for Print
  • Social Media
  • Email Marketing
  • SERVICES
  • CONTACT

Home

WEBSITE & GRAPHIC DESIGN AYLESBURY

Whether you need to stay ahead of the competition, launch an online eCommerce store or just need to tell people what you do, we have the skills to create exactly what you need to make that impression online. We plan and design your website to ensure it’s easy to use and update, looks great and gets returning customers. Read More»

LOGO DESIGN & BRANDING

If you’re thinking of developing an existing brand or creating a new one  – we’d like to help. We’ll make it as easy as possible. SHARED creative can help you create an identity that will positively transform and add value to your business. Contact us to see how we can help. Read More»

DESIGN FOR PRINT

From Annual Reviews, to Leaflets, Sales brochures, Outdoor Banners or Exhibition Stands. We can produce a coherent eye-catching body of marketing materials that engages your audience, leaving a lasting positive impression of your brand. Read More»

WEBSITE & EMAIL HOSTING

Hosting your website is really important to us, that’s why we’ve partnered ourselves with one of the largest hosting providers in Europe. They have invested millions to ensure websites enjoy the very highest levels of uptime and security, with the power to cope with surges in demand, plus unexpected power or network outages. Read More»

ABOUT SHARED CREATIVE

SHARED creative are a web and graphic design agency specialising in the design and production of media for various businesses, charities and education establishments. Our skills help brands get noticed in challenging and crowded markets through creative and innovative design. Read More»

  • Welcome to Cuddington and
    Dinton Church of England
    School

    Cuddington and Dinton C of E is a growing primary
    school spread across two villages, 2 1/2 miles apart:
    the Infant site is in Cuddington and the Junior
    site is in Dinton    . We currently have 180 pupils aged
    between 4 and 11, in classes no greater than 26 pupils.

    READ MORE ABOUT OUR SCHOOL

  • ‘Let your light shine’ Matthew 5:16 is central to all that we do as a Christian school community. We work together to nurture the well-being, learning and development of everyone, empowering all to shine as individuals through clearly understood values and behaviour, founded in the Christian faith.
